domain.name: Brand Vertical

domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.name: Financial Services Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to Banks, Credit cards, Insurance, Investments, Stocks

domain.name: Business Taxonomy
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.name: Travel & Transportation Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to travel as airlines, travel agencies, hotels

data.text: @Lxay_nirmal Hi Lakshay, you may carry the laptop in hand baggage. Please note that one piece of hand baggage of up to 7 kg (including laptop and duty-free) is allowed per passenger.
@ashfaqqureshi91 As checked, our team has shared a response yesterday at 1039 hours. Please check.
@stupidsid26 Hi Siddhesh, please note that the check-in counter opens two hours prior to the flight departure for a domestic flight.

@satyend76608338 Hi Satyendra, kindly note that SpiceJet follows a dynamic pricing structure whereby the fares vary as per the seat availability per flight. We only have a certain number of seats available for a specific price, and once those are purchased, the next available fare is released
@golechha Hi Manish, you may add Spice Max to your booking via our website https://t.co/iQhxtfVkkj through the Manage Booking option.
